references: We demonstrate that it is possible to combine DPFL-BCS with other DP-improving algorithms, which have ignored clientsâ€™ heterogeneous privacy requirement. We implement PRIVATEFLÂ [12] as a case study under both Gaussian and Laplace mechanisms. It means that a biased client selection strategy in lieu of a pure random strategy is adopted in PRIVATEFL. The results in TableÂ I are presented with mean Â±plus-or-minus\pm std, which show that: 1) PRIVATEFL has poor performance under heterogeneous privacy settings because it does not discriminate clients with heterogeneous privacy when making selection decisions; 2) DPFL-BCS can significantly improve the performance of PRIVATEFL under heterogeneous privacy by selecting clients in a biased manner.
